channel.title: Server Base question
channel.description:
Well I was looking at the PS Base sticky in the download section, and I had a couple questions.
1) Do the bases have all the items/npcs/emotes in them, I just need to spawn them and set drops, etc.?
2) Will they use the same format as the code you'd edit for regular source code? (EG: When you add in an NPC spawn it's like 1615 x coord y coord etc...)
That will be all. Thank you.

item.title: Server Base question
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

Coding requires much more work

When they say “Server Bases” they are bases that have very little coded in them, they usually just have some of the essentials.

Such as, login, walking, talking and if your lucky, trading and private chat.

Also, this doesn’t belong here…

Read full topic
